ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Belt of Concordance speedup
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Er, the BoC by itself is 15% haste.  Anthem is 10% haste. Yet Anthem + BoC = 75% haste.  I would ve expected a 25% haste, or 26% haste at most (1.1*1.15 =
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 3 Apr 2000, M Sanford wrote:

> The belt is indeed the same speed as the FBSS. With FBSS
> you'll get the same results with all your tests as you did
> with the BoC. The belt has no "special" ability which puts
> you at 75%. There is a CAP on weapon speed. It is roughly
> 55% of the original weapon speed. Meaning if you stack
> just about *any* attack speed buff on a FBSS, BoC,
> Swirlspine, CoF, RBB, etc it will always cap out at that
> 55% of the original weapon speed. Not sure if you noticed,

Er, the BoC by itself is 15% haste. Anthem is 10% haste.
Yet Anthem + BoC = 75% haste. I would've expected a 25%
haste, or 26% haste at most (1.1*1.15 = 1.265).

This is *not* a case of two hastes stacking to put me at the
cap. Something is putting me at the cap despite the
cumulative hastes being nowhere near it.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
